title: Thurgood Marshall Commemorative Coin Act of 1997
content: Thurgood Marshall Commemorative Coin Act of 1997 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue one-dollar coins emblematic of the tenure of Associate Justice Thurgood Marshall on the Supreme Court of the United States. Mandates that all surcharges received from coin sales be paid to the Historical Preservation Committee of the Supreme Court Historical Society for the purpose of collecting and preserving the physical history of the Court.
